title: Group portrait of three men, including smiling groom wearing dark bow tie and light colored carnation, and four women, including smiling bride wearing hat with mid length veil and lace edge, earrings, light colored short sleeve wedding dress, floral lace yoke, satin skirt with floral lace overlay on left, and sheer elbow length fingerless gloves, holding bible with ribbons and flowers, posed in front of two toned background with striped background on either side in Harris Studio with photographers light on right, possibly for Gibson Brown wedding
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
